author: JHSthirteen
title: 570 fire house
review: Set 570, Fire House is a very simple set. A bit repetitive as it’s mostly just 1x2 and 1x4 bricks. Doesn’t include any useful bricks aside from a lego flag, a few 1x2 red bricks with the lego logo, and a 1x4 white brick with the lego land logo. But these parts are present in many other sets of that era. The fire engines are cool but aren’t any different from other sets. There are also nice red window pieces. And a unique plate with smooth parts to act as a driveway for the fire engines. It also has a nice stone path to the main “building” area. I give this set a 6/10 as it’s mostly just white brick with some printed elements but it definitely it a “classic” set
